All Classes and Interfaces

Class
Description
AddHouseHoldItemFragment
This class represents the fragment for adding a new household item
AddItemTest
This class tests the add item functionality
AuthenticationService
Handles authentication with Firebase
AuthenticationService.OnSignInListener
Interface for callbacks when sign in is successful or failed
BarcodeRepository
Interacts with the database to search for items that match with the barcodes
BarcodeRepository.OnCompleteListener
Callback for when the item is found or not found
BarcodeScanner
Scans barcodes from an image
BarcodeScanner.OnCompleteListener
Callback for when the barcode is found or not found
CameraActivity
This class is an Activity that allows the user to take a photo
CameraActivityResultContract
Starts CameraActivity and returns the image taken
ChipGroupItemCountAssertion
This helper class is used to assert the number of chips in a ChipGroup
ChipInputView
This class is an UI component that allows Chips to be inside InputTextLayout.
ClickEndIconViewAction
This helper class is used to click on the end icon inside a TextInputLayout
ConditionalClickAction
This helper class is used to click on a view if it is not checked
EditHouseHoldItemFragment
This class is a Fragment that allows the user to edit a household item
EditItemTest
This class tests the edit item functionality
HouseHoldItem
Contains information about a household item
HouseHoldItemRepository
Handles interactions with the Firestore db
HouseHoldItemRepository.OnItemsFetchedListener
Listener for when items are fetched from the db
HouseHoldItemsAdapter
This class is used to display the list of HouseHoldItem objects in a RecyclerView.
HouseHoldItemsAdapter.MultiSelectionModeListener
Interface for the multi selection mode
HouseHoldItemsAdapter.OnItemClickListener
Interface for the item click event
HouseHoldItemsFragment
This class is a Fragment that displays the list of HouseHoldItem objects in a RecyclerView.
HouseHoldItemTest
Unit tests for HouseHoldItem class
HouseHoldItemViewModel
This class is used to store the HouseHoldItem objects.
ImageAdapter
This class is used to display the list of ImageItem objects in a RecyclerView.
ImageItem
This class represents an image item
ImageItemTest
Unit tests for ImageItem class
ImageRepository
Handles the upload and deletion of images to/from storage
ImageRepository.OnUploadListener
Listener for the upload event
MainActivity
 
MultiSelectionTest
This class tests the multi selection functionality
PhotoTest
This class tests the photo functionality
RecyclerViewItemCountAssertion
This helper class is used to assert the number of items in a RecyclerView
ScanningTest
This class tests scanning barcode and serial number functionality
SerialNumberScanner
Scans an image for a serial number
SerialNumberScanner.OnCompleteListener
Listener for the scan event
SortAndFilterBottomSheet
Class for the sort and filter bottom sheet
SortAndFilterOption
This class is used to store the sort and filter options that the user has selected.
SortAndFilterTest
This class tests the sorting and filtering functionality
SortAndFilterViewModel
This class is used to store the sort and filter options that the user has selected.
TotalEstimatedValueTest
This class tests whether the total estimated value is up to date
UserProfileTest
This class tests whether the user is logged in when the app opens up
